meanings.definition: Relating to or consisting of cells.
meanings.sent1: The human body is made up of many cellular structures.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the cellular composition of the plant tissue.
meanings.sent3: The cellular organization of the beehive was quite impressive.
meanings.sent4: The city's layout had a cellular pattern, resembling a living organism.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the cellular details were fascinating to observe.

meanings.definition: Involving the use of cell phones or other mobile communication devices.
meanings.sent1: She relied on cellular technology to stay connected while traveling.
meanings.sent2: The cellular network coverage in the area was excellent.
meanings.sent3: The spy's mission depended on a secure cellular connection.
meanings.sent4: In the digital age, cellular communication has become essential for daily life.
meanings.sent5: The concertgoers used their cellular devices to capture the moment.
